name: SMW Central - Show The Trophies
description: A very small script that automatically expands the trophies section from the SMW Central profile page without enabling Javascript.
additional_info: Browse my Stylish scripts project from NotABug.org: https://notabug.org/GrandChaos9000/smwc-scripts
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.smwcentral.net/?p=profile")
{ /* SMW Central - Show The Trophies
   *
   * A very small script that automatically expands the trophies section
   * from the SMW Central profile page without enabling Javascript.
   *
   * Important note: You must require installing Stylish add-on instead.
   *
   * (C) 2009-15 The Grandoplex Project.
   * Made in Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia.
   *
   * This script by Jayvee Enaguas (GrandChaos9000)
   * <grandchaos9000(at)openmailbox(dot)org> is licensed
   * under the CC0 1.0. To view a copy of this license, visit
   * <https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0>
   */

  #trophies-full
  { display: block !important; }

  #trophies-full .title.border.center,
  #trophies-stub
  { display: none !important; } }
